MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL22 postcode area of Abergele, affecting properties in a widespread area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get the power back on in stages as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:30AM 28th October 2020
